About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals and photographs.

About.Acquisition focus: Documentary and photographic records and memorabilia of archival and general interest value, relating to Scotch College and its staff, students and past students.

About.Major holdings: Scotch College, Swanbourne: Minutes, Correspondence, Photographs, Periodicals, Activities reports, Admission Registers, Interview transcripts, etc., from 1897.
